name: Grandma's Chicken Soup
author: Love2c0ok
summary: Whenever you're feeling sick, this will make you feel better! Trust me, you can even freeze it, this way you have it whenever you need it. Serve with egg noodles, if desired.
directions: Clean chicken and remove some, but not all, fat
Place in a 2-quart soup pot with carrots, celery, tomatoes, and onion
Tie all dill sprigs into a bunch with kitchen string; add to the pot with salt and pepper
Add water until chicken is covered by 2 inches
Cook over medium-low heat until chicken is just about cooked through, about 3 hours
Remove chicken to a platter and allow to cool slightly, 15 to 20 minutes
Cut meat off the bones, place meat back into the pot, and discard the bones
Cook over medium-low heat until heated through, about 30 minutes longer
